评论概述: A classic, easy fit college logo shirt
类型: Size: SmallColor: Washington Huskies - Fall Heather
评论详情: The university logos on these shirts are literally old school and as classic as they come. The shirt has a lot of ease in the fit for women, likely because it is unisex. The fabric is soft and light-to-midweight. I chose my alma mater, but I like the classic logos so much I think I'll get a couple more for some of the lesser known schools with clever mascots.

类型: Size: SmallColor: Michigan Wolverines - Fall Heather
评论详情: I have the Michigan version and the maize and blue colors are accurate along with the block M logo. The fabric is very soft with the nice cotton/poly blend. Sizing is accurate.  The heathered appearance is more pronounced in real life compared to the picture. Not a bad thing as the heathered variations look good.

类型: Size: MediumColor: Northwestern Wildcats - Fall Heather
评论详情: Great fabric!! Soft and comfortable. Size true to size. Medium. Female 5ft 4 inches, 126 pounds
